text: Christiane Eda-Pierre (March 24, 1932 – September 5, 2020) was a French coloratura soprano.Alain Pâris. Dictionnaire des interprètes et de l’interprétation musicale au XX siècle. Éditions Robert Laffont, Paris, 1995 (p377). She sang in many roles, from baroque to contemporary works. Eda-Pierre was born in Fort-de-France, Martinique. She made her debut at the Opéra- Comique in 1958, as Lakmé. She played Papagena in The Magic Flute, and at the Palais Garnier in 1960, as Lucia di Lammermoor. Eda-Pierre died on September 5, 2020 at the age of 88.La cantatrice Christiane Éda-Pierre est décédée ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French singers Category:People from Martinique
title: Christiane Eda-Pierre
